price: 11. Y de nada le servirán sus riquezas cuando perezca y entre en el fuego.
arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā yugh'nī ʿanhu māluhu idhā taraddā
